author: Luke Barr
title: To enforce coronavirus distancing, police say arrests are last resort
description: It is difficult to enforce COVID-19 stay-at-home orders.
content: After some of the nation's first arrests for violations of coranavirus-related distancing orders, police across the country are attempting to navigate the delicate task of enforcing the new rules -- preferably less with handcuffs than with help from the commu… [+5719 chars]
